column1:
share on x sh shelly. jun 21 at 5:35 pm at phil and wendy's wedding, i remember the look on matt's (best man) face when he got the garter and was trying to put it on sara's (matron of honor) leg... it was priceless. my thoughts and prayer go to all who knew and loved him.. judging by the pics and videos i saw of him hunting, fishing, getting on his 4 wheeler, he was remarkable... may he rest in peace.. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ia irene atwater aunt. jun 21 at 3:48 pm thinking of you and your family. god bless and know that your army of relatives are thinking and praying for youaunt irene. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sg stacy godfrey. jun 21 at 1:45 pm matthew was a hero to me. matt's father is my uncle and i grew up spending so much time with him. i will miss him so much and he will never be forgotten. i am happy to know that we will see each other again. i love you matthew davis and i will see you again. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ms mickey & lori sims. jun 21 at 1:20 pm lit a candle in memory of matthew davis. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dd dorothy dickerson. jun 21 at 11:46 am phil and family, my heart aches for you. just want you to know you are all in my thoughts and prayers. wish i could be there for you but that is not possible. love you all! aunt dorothy. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook emerald coast funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
